name: Tatiana Story
bio: I am loud and out-going, spunky and an enigma.  The weird one (in a good way) in most any social group of people.  I have a deep appreciation for the little things in life...after all, it's the little things that count most.  I believe that the best gift given is love and friendship.  I love experiencing all the world has to offer, meeting new people and never living the same day twice.  My personality is easy going laid back and I am curious by nature.  I have a thirst for life that always pushes me to go beyond my comfort zones and live as much as this world has to offer.
quotes:
Live life, don't just exist.

If you get a chance, take it.  If it changes your life, let it.

work.description: We are an entertainment company specializing in production events with creative focus on hair, styling and make-up.
